1.5.0.name: drupal/mms

security-coverage.message: Covered by Drupal's security advisory policy

1.5.0.description: Multilinguism Made Simple. Unifies handling of all translations at once for any block, node, or structural content (taxonomy, menus, content types, field labels...) without needing additional containers nor other translation dedicated modules.
